Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
implements UI
This class represents the Graphical User Interface. It implements UI and extends Application so as it can host different scenes. It creates several controllers to visualize different scenes of the game. See DisconnectionController, DivinitySelectionController, EndGameController, LoginController, MatchController, PlayerDivinitySelectionController

  • Nested Class Summary

    • loser

      public void loser​(java.lang.String username)
      Called when a user lost. A method updates the board (MatchController.manageLoserPlayer(). If the losing player is this client, then they will be able to watch the rest of the game but will not be able to perform actions (MatchController.loserPlayer(); otherwise a text message displays the name of the losing player (MatchController.textMessage(String, String, String)
      Specified by:
      loser in interface UI
      Parameters:
      username - Name of loser

    • winner

      public void winner​(java.lang.String username)
      Manages the victory of a player: if this client is the winner EndGameController.setWinner() else EndGameController.setLoser(). Anyways the game ends but the users can reconnect to start another game.
      Specified by:
      winner in interface UI
      Parameters:
      username - Name of winner

    • loadGUI

      protected void loadGUI() throws java.io.IOException
      Loads the resources that will be used to display the GUI elements from fxml files. It also binds the controllers in order to use them after their setup happened (initialize() has been called when creating them)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - thrown if the fxmlLoader fails to retrieve the files.
